EmailTemplate.name: Unregistered email
EmailTemplate.subject: You've unregistered from {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!CampaignMember.CompanyOrAccount},
You've unregistered from {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c} and will no longer be attending.
Thanks for letting us know!
Kind regards,
{!Campaign.Campaign_Owner_Name__c}
Camp Quality
